name: Roll of the Dice (Xefortanzo, Shamps)
description:
-Controls- 

Arrow Keys - move the cursor 

X - select a dice or a slot in your planner

-Goal-

As part of your very organised life, select a dice roll and slot it into your planner.

Complete three activities in a day to max out your stats before facing The Big Interview! 

You have three Stats that will govern your day.

  • Energy
  • Suaveness
  • Intelligence

Can you find the 4 endings?!?!?    Good Luck!

----- Here Are Some Dice. Go Organise Your Day!

Today's the day of The Big Job Interview!

But first, you've got to get through your to-do list!

Can you choose the correct dice to pass with flying colours?

Or, once again, will the fickle winds of fate see fit to mess with your chances?

----- Other design ideas we didn't have time for?
  • A reroll button!
    Get a rubbish roll for Ironing Clothes? Mulligan your way to pristine shirts!

  • Different dice types!
    Tired: Roll a D6 for breakfast -> get some dry toast
    Inspired: Roll a D20 for breakfast -> Start your day right with your own body weight in "Crunchy Sugar Corn Nuggets TM"

  • More Mundanity! More Insanity?
    Walk to Work, Get the Bus, File your Taxes,
    Go Swimming with Dolphins, Defend Earth from Invading Broccolis,
    Throw a Ping-Pong Ball into a Plastic Cup?!?!?!?
    The possibilities are limitless*

  • Dynamic Face Technology!
    Powered by the latest innovations in AI Machine Deep Learning**, the facial expressions of your character will adjust according to their stat changes!
  • Consistent Pluralisation!
    Is it dice? Is it die? Dices!?!?
    Literally no one knows! But, fret not, we'll do the hard work and find out what to call groups of these throwable cuboids of chance!

* Within the reasonable limits of the developers' abilities to produce endless reams of nonsense for your enjoyment...
** Pre-Singularity builds of the game will only feature rudimentary, and mostly static, pixel art
